roleset.name: to bring back into existence or use
roleset.note: REESTABLISH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'reestablish' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from reestablish.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: reestablish-v: transitive
example.text: [Stock-index arbitrage]-1 , because it sells the more `` expensive '' market and buys the `` cheaper '' one , attempts [*-1]to reestablish the link between the stock and futures markets , and the adjustments are often abrupt .
example.arg: the link between the stock and futures markets
